66713.<%sL_PC>は\n<%sL_SKILL_NAME>設備の 近くにいないので\:
Since <%sL_PC> isn't near the
<%sL_SKILL_NAME> facility, you can submit a
request for <%sL_SYOKUNIN_TYPE>...

66714.<speed=0>\n「錬金の依頼」の 説明です！\n<br>\nツボ錬金職人か:
This will explain "Alchemy Requests"!
You can request a Pot or Lamp Alchemist to add alchemy effects to your equipment.
The request will succeed once you choose what you want, and the other player accepts. You can request items you have equipped.
The requestor must provide all necessary materials and crafting tools, as well as the equipment.
As always, please remember that alchemy is a very risky procedure. You may end up with bad or unwanted effects.

66715.錬金の依頼を中止したため 錬金が失敗しました。:
The request was cancelled, so the alchemy
was not successful.

66717.<%sL_PC>に <%sL_SYOKUNIN_TYPE>の依頼を 申し込みまし:
Requesting <%sL_SYOKUNIN_TYPE> for
<%sL_PC>... Can't move while requesting
<%sL_SYOKUNIN_TYPE>...<cancel>And I had to cancel...<break>
